element.name: ADO:DP_Metadata
element.label: Metadata (ADO)
element.description: root entity which defines metadata about a resource or resources

element.name: ADO:DP_Contact
element.label: Contact (ADO)
element.description: information required to enable contact with the responsible person and/or organization

element.name: ADO:DP_Constraints
element.label: Constraints (ADO)
element.description: restrictions on the access and use of a resource or metadata

element.name: ADO:DP_ResponsibleParty
element.label: Responsible party (ADO)
element.description: identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations associated with the dataset

element.name: ADO:DP_DataIdentification
element.label: Data identification (ADO)
element.description: information required to identify an ADO Profile dataset

element.name: ADO:resourceConstraints
element.label: Resource constraints (ADO)
element.description: provides information about constraints which apply to the resource(s)

element.name: ADO:DP_LegalConstraints
element.label: Legal constraints (ADO)
element.description: restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource

element.name: ADO:DP_SecurityConstraints
element.label: Security constraints (ADO)
element.description: handling restrictions imposed on the resource for national security or similar security concerns

element.name: ADO:defencePurpose
element.label: Defence Purpose (ADO)
element.description: summary of the intentions with which the resource(s) was developed

element.name: ADO:productNumber
element.label: Product Number (ADO)
element.description: Alphanumeric entry identifying the product number

element.name: ADO:DP_RangeDimension
element.label: Range dimension (ADO)
element.description: information on the range of each dimension of a cell measurement value

element.name: ADO:sequenceIdentifier
element.label: Sequence identifier (ADO)
element.description: number that uniquely identifies instances of bands of wavelengths on which a sensor operates

element.name: ADO:DP_Distribution
element.label: Distribution (ADO)
element.description: information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource

element.name: ADO:DP_ScopeDescription
element.label: Scope description (ADO)
element.description: description of the class of information covered by the information

element.name: ADO:CI_CharacterSetCode
element.label: Character set (ADO)
element.description: name of the character coding standard used for the metadata set
